fasianoptions, which is due to be installed in the Debian FTP archive:

  to pool/main/f/fasianoptions/fasianoptions_260.72-4.diff.gz

  to pool/main/f/fasianoptions/r-cran-fasianoptions_260.72-4_i386.deb



A summary of the changes between this version and the previous one is
attached.

Thank you for reporting the bug, which will now be closed.  If you
have further comments please address them to 476825@bugs.debian.org,
and the maintainer will reopen the bug report if appropriate.

Debian distribution maintenance software
pp.
Dirk Eddelbuettel <edd@debian.org> (supplier of updated fasianoptions pac=

believe that there is a problem with it please contact the archive
